ComicInfo.Summary:
Badrock meets Savage Dragon and explains to him his plan to destroy Overlord. SD agrees to help him and his allies (Gunner and Badrock's dad)
This is a flip book with the other half being Badrock #2.
The comic ends with to be concluded appearing on the last page but issue 3 was never released.
ComicInfo.Title: Badrock
